subproject.description:
The project is part of UNDP Thailand core programme and closely linked to UNDAF objective to "empower the most vulnerable people and to build capacity of the people in responsible positions to fulfill their societal obligation." The overarching theme is "human security" with the focused areas in (1) democratic governance and human security; (2) environment and climate change; (3) policy advocacy and statistic information.    

The project in relation to capacity building of governance is aimed to achieve the following outputs:
(1) Output 1: Improved Social Responsive Delivery through Supporting Legal Reform and Access to Justice; and (2) Output 4:  Transforming special form of local government through human security lens.

Output 4.1 :  Transforming special form of local government through human security lens
subproject.title: Integrated ONE AWP-Governance

subproject.description: Environmental governance on climate change and natural resources management enhanced from the policy level to local government, and vulnerable communities, with an emphasis on the private sector partnership and the use of economic instruments for sustainable development.
subproject.title: Integrated ONE AWP-Envi and CC

subproject.description: Environmental governance on climate change and natural resources management enhanced from the policy level to local government, and vulnerable communities, with an emphasis on the private sector partnership and the use of economic instruments for sustainable development.
subproject.title: Integrated ONE AWP-Envi and CC

subproject.description:
Issues related to women would be discussed during capacity assessment forums of the Ministry of Social Development and Human Security at provincial level.  Analysis on gender related to "creative economy initiative" as well as to "policy forum on human security" and "impact on global financial crisis" would be carried out during the project implementation. 
In addition, Aid Effectiveness Model for South-South Cooperation and strategic information about Thailand Model shall be available and accessed by international development cooperation partners. Furthermore, strategic information on multi-dimensional poverty and gender both as human security issues to Thailand shall be available and used as a reference for policy advocacy and decision making.
subproject.gender code: Gender equality as a significant objective
subproject.title: Integrated ONE AWP-Policy&Advo
